message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I can offer it to you for $85. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to pay $75 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $82. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll be happy with this price.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if this is the right price for me. I'd be willing to pay $78 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $81. This is my final concession, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not sure if this is the right price for me. I'd be willing to pay $78 for the product. Can you reconsider?
I've already made my final concession, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $81. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
